#summary The requirements for the DAISY Online Protocol
#labels Phase-Requirements

<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

----

= In-scope =

== Content Management ==

=== Efficient use of bandwidth ===
Protocol to support efficient use of bandwidth. _(Original requirement 2 (1). User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Authorization_of_content_(server) Authorization of content (server)])_

=== Key authorization ===
Protocol to support efficient key authorisation checking. _(Original requirement 2 (2). User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Authorization_of_content_(server) Authorization of content (server)])_

=== Return book ===
The Reading System must be able to notify the Service that content has been deleted (e.g. for a limited lending programme where a user may only have a certain number of books "out" at one time). _(Original requirement 8 (modified). User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Return_book Return book])_

=== Transmit capabilities ===
The protocol must be able to support the transmission of the class and capabilities (storage) of the player. _(Original requirement 12. User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Determine_player_capabilities Determine player capabilities])_

=== Universal protocol ===
The protocol must be the same between organisations. _(Original requirement 15 (1). User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Access_content_from_different_organizations Access content from different organizations])_

=== Player stores contact information ===
Player must store contact information for each service/organisation. _(Original requirement 15 (2). User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Access_content_from_different_organizations Access content from different organizations])_

=== Content at different location ===
The protocol must support content being at different location to the user information. _(Original requirement 17 (1). User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Centralized_authentication Centralized authentication])_

=== Time interrogation ===
Protocol must allow the interrogation of time by the player. _(Original requirement 21. User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Expiration_date_for_content Expiration date for content])_

=== Download and streaming ===
The protocol must support both downloading and streaming. _(Original requirement 62. User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Provide_content Provide content])_

=== Key delivery ===

The Reading System must be able to request keys for use with PDTB2 by their key identifier and by the identifiers of a set of key pairs, one of which is to be used for encrypting the requested key. The Service must be able to provide a Key Exchange Object to a valid key request, or to reply that the Reading System is not authorized to receive that key. _(New requirement. User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Key_delivery Key delivery])_

----

== User Control ==

=== Same book, different player ===
A single user may download the same book but to a different player. _(Original requirement 3 (1). User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Different_devices,_same_content Different devices, same content])_

=== Bookmark stored on server ===
The reading history (bookmark) of each book is stored on the server as well as the client. _(Original requirement 3 (2). User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Different_devices,_same_content Different devices, same content])_

=== Issue content ===
The Reading System must be able to request content.  The Service must be able to approve or deny the request. _(Original requirement 10 (modified). User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Confirm_user_wants_book Confirm user wants book])_

=== Audio and text annotation ===
Transmission of lists supports audio and text annotation. _(Original requirement 14. User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Choose_book_from_narrative Choose book from narrative])_

=== Stop and resume download ===
The protocol must support stop/resume of the download. _(Original requirement 18. User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Interact_with_a_download Interact with a download])_

=== Dynamic menus ===
_Proposed:_ The Service must be able to provide an interactive session and a means of selecting content. _(New requirement. User Stories: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Advanced_service_(server) Advanced service (server)] and [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Advanced_service_(user) Advanced service (user)])_

=== Noninteractive session ===
_Proposed:_ The Service must be able to provide a noninteractive session where preselected content is transferred automatically to the Reading System. User Stories: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Basic_service_(server) Basic service (server)] and [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Basic_service_(user) Basic service (user)])_

----

== Preview ==

=== Prioritize order of files ===
Protocol needs to prioritise order of files for each content so it can be played. _(Original requirement 4. User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Ability_to_play_before_download_is_complete Ability to play before download is complete])_

=== Interact with content ===
The protocol supports interaction with the content. _(Original requirement 5. User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Review_content_before_selection Review content before selection])_

----

== Information Management ==

=== Transmit bookmarks ===
Protocol must allow the transmission of bookmarks as a separate entity to the book. Protocol should recognise bookmarks as non book content and a player can transmit bookmarks back to the server and vice versa. Protocol must allow the transmission of bookmarks as a separate entity to the book (within DAISY ISO 2005 standard there is no attribute that identifies a bookmark as private/shared). _(Original requirements 6, 33 and 36. User Stories: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Keep_bookmarks Keep bookmarks], [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Bookmark_content Bookmark content] and [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Preset_bookmarks Preset bookmarks])_

=== Report firmware version ===
Protocol has to report firmware version of the player. _(Original requirement 16 (2). User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Diagnose_player_status Diagnose player status])_

=== Report download activity ===
Protocol has to report download activity. _(Original requirement 16 (3). User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Diagnose_player_status Diagnose player status])_

=== Report player errors ===
The protocol should support transmission of error messages from the reading system to the service. _(Original requirement 7 (modified). User Stories: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Diagnose_player_status Diagnose player status], [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Tell_server_download_failed Tell server download failed] and [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Error_code_knowledge_base Error code knowledge base])_

=== Report which server is in control ===
Protocol must report which server is in control. _(Original requirement 16 (5). User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Diagnose_player_status Diagnose player status])_

=== Protect user privacy ===
The protocol must ensure protection of a users privacy. _(Original requirement 20. User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#No_personal_information No personal information])_

=== Localized, plain language error messages ===
Error messages must be easily modified to provide meaningful information in plain language of the user. _(Original requirement 24. User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Meaningful_error_messages Meaningful error messages])_

----

= Out-of-scope =

== Content Management ==

=== Report number of books ===
Players must notify how may books the user has on them. _(Original requirement 9. User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Maximum_entries_in_a_bookshelf Maximum entries in a bookshelf])_

=== Ping servers ===
The players must periodically ping the servers and report its status. _(Original requirement 13. User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Know_if_player_is_online Know if player is online])_

=== Transmit storage space ===
The protocol must support the transmission of the storage available on the player from the player to the server. _(Original requirement 22. User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Enough_space_to_store_content_(server) Enough space to store content (server)])_

=== Suggest mirrors ===
Protocol must support the server suggesting mirror sites to download the content from. _(Original requirement 17 (2). User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Centralized_authentication Centralized authentication])_

=== Trace routing ===
Trace routing must be supported. _(Original requirement 17 (3). User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Centralized_authentication Centralized authentication])_

=== Initial transaction ===
Initial transaction between when a player is first turned on and the server. _(Original requirement 27. User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Content_provider_discovery Content provider discovery])_ This was the requirement for server discoverability.

----

== User Control ==

=== Requires some player functionality ===
Requires some player functionality as well. _(Original requirement 19. User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Give_feedback Give feedback])_

=== Identify and transfer service provider ===
The protocol must support identification and transference of the primary service provider. _(Original requirement 60. User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Switch_primary_content_provider Switch primary content provider])_ This was moved out of scope because it is a reading system function.

=== User preferences stored on server ===
The user preferences are stored on the server so that remote access from different terminals can automatically be adjusted. _(Original requirement 61. User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Player_settings Player settings])_ The subgroup saw little benefit to this function, but is keeping the issue open for a later version.

----

== Information Management ==

=== Report player's status ===
Protocol must report players status. _(Original requirement 16 (1). User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Diagnose_player_status Diagnose player status])_

=== Variety of system messages ===
Protocol must allow to transmit a variety of system messages. _(Original requirement 11. User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Push_system_messages Push system messages])_

----

== Organization Control ==

=== Without user interaction ===
The protocol supports the background communication without user interaction as much as possible. _(Original requirement 25. User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Unobtrusive_service Unobtrusive service])_

=== New service registration ===
The protocol has to support the registration with a new service provider. _(Original requirement 28. User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Subscribe_to_services Subscribe to services])_

=== Expose transactions ===
The protocol must be able to expose, to the player, the transactions. _(Original requirement 26. User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Level_of_support_services Level of support services])_

----

== Development ==

=== Not Invented Here ===
Work group to review and use existing standards and tool wherever possible. _(Original requirement 23. User Story: [http://code.google.com/p/daisy-online-delivery/wiki/UserStories#Existing_standards_and_toolkits Existing standards and toolkits])_
